turkish_example_sentence: Ben o ilginç hikayeyi duysam çok şaşırırdım.
english_example_sentence: If I were to hear that interesting story, I would be very surprised.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я услышал эту интересную историю, я был бы очень удивлен.
